files.patch:
@@ -58,4 +58,3 @@
-            dist-arch: arm64
-            dist-name: bullseye
-            dist-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
-            dist-components: 'main'
+            debian-arch: arm64
+            debian-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+            debian-version: bullseye
@@ -64,4 +63,3 @@
-            dist-arch: armhf
-            dist-name: bullseye
-            dist-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
-            dist-components: 'main'
+            debian-arch: armhf
+            debian-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+            debian-version: bullseye
@@ -71,4 +69,3 @@
-            dist-arch: s390x
-            dist-name: bullseye
-            dist-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
-            dist-components: 'main'
+            debian-arch: s390x
+            debian-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+            debian-version: bullseye
@@ -77,4 +74,3 @@
-            dist-arch: ppc64el
-            dist-name: bullseye
-            dist-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
-            dist-components: 'main'
+            debian-arch: ppc64el
+            debian-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+            debian-version: bullseye
@@ -83,4 +79,4 @@
-            dist-arch: riscv64
-            dist-name: jammy
-            dist-repository: http://ports.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-ports
-            dist-components: 'main,universe'
+            debian-arch: riscv64
+            debian-repository: https://deb.debian.org/debian-ports
+            debian-keyring: /usr/share/keyrings/debian-ports-archive-keyring.gpg
+            debian-version: sid
@@ -116,1 +112,2 @@
-              libxrandr-dev libxtst-dev libcups2-dev libasound2-dev
+              libxrandr-dev libxtst-dev libcups2-dev libasound2-dev \
+              debian-ports-archive-keyring
@@ -124,1 +121,1 @@
-          key: sysroot-${{ matrix.dist-arch }}-${{ hashFiles('./.github/workflows/build-cross-compile.yml') }}
+          key: sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}-${{ hashFiles('./.github/workflows/build-cross-compile.yml') }}
@@ -133,0 +130,1 @@
+          --arch=${{ matrix.debian-arch }}
@@ -134,2 +132,0 @@
-          --arch=${{ matrix.dist-arch }}
-          --components=${{ matrix.dist-components }}
@@ -138,1 +134,2 @@
-          ${{ matrix.dist-name }}
+          $(test -n "${{ matrix.debian-keyring }}" && echo "--keyring=${{ matrix.debian-keyring }}")
+          ${{ matrix.debian-version }}
@@ -140,1 +137,1 @@
-          ${{ matrix.dist-repository }}
+          ${{ matrix.debian-repository }}
